title: How to Analyse Data Using SPSS

steps.title: Load your excel file with all the data.
steps.content: Load your excel file with all the data. Once you have collected all the data, keep the excel file ready with all data inserted using the right tabular forms. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Import the data into SPSS.
steps.content: Import the data into SPSS. You need to import your raw data into SPSS through your excel file. Once you import the data, the SPSS will analyse it.

steps.title: Give specific SPSS commands.
steps.content: Give specific SPSS commands. Based on what you want to examine, you can give desired commands as per the requisitions in the SPSS software. Each tool has guidelines on how it should be used and you can feed in all the options to get the most accurate results. Giving commands in SPSS is simple and easy to comprehend, making it an easy task for students to do this by themselves. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Retrieve the results.
steps.content: Retrieve the results. The results from the software are given efficiently and accurately, providing researchers a better idea of appropriate future studies and a direction for moving forward. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Analyse the graphs and charts.
steps.content: Analyse the graphs and charts. Understanding the results can be a little difficult. but you can get help from professors and peers with the analysis. You can also consult a professional company which is expert in SPSS. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Postulate conclusions based on your analysis.
steps.content: Postulate conclusions based on your analysis. The ultimate objective of the SPSS is to help arrive at conclusions based on specific research. The software helps you to derive conclusions and predict the future easily with minimum statistical deviation. [5] X Research source
